name: 陳盈竹
objective: This course is an introduction to digital publication. Class aims for understanding the fundamental design rules and process for digital publication design.  By working on design layouts such as Digital Flyer, Digital Magazines, and Packaging layouts, students can have experience on actual design process.
schedule:
01	Introduction
02	Case Study: Flyers
03	Flyer Exercise I
04	Flyer Exercise II & Discussion
05	Case Study: Brochure
06	Brochure Exercise I
07	Brochure Exercise II & Discussion
08	Mid-Review
09	Magazine/ digital publications
10	Magazine/ digital publications Exercise I
11	Magazine/ digital publications II & Discussion
12	Case Study: Packaging layouts
13	Packaging layouts Exercise I
14	Packaging layouts Exercise II & Discussion
15	Packaging layouts Exercise III
16	Final project workshop
17	Final project workshop
18	Final Review
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 15%
Class Assignments: 50%
Mid Review: 15%
Final Review: 20%
materials: class material will be provided by the instructor
consultation: Email & Appointment: aliceycchen@ntut.edu.twJoin google classroom during the first week of class
